Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

He had just fell face-first after letting out a cry of desperation to see i=
f any intelligent life roamed here.   But he continued to struggle, and kep=
t on crawling.  Suddenly, he was taken by surprise as something within him =
crackled and screeched for a couple seconds, and he heard a voice!  It was =
somebody claiming they had crashed and that they were "Decepticons", whatev=
er that was, followed by somebody replying and saying they'd be coming.  Wi=
thout any idea what he was actually doing, instinct took command of him, an=
d somehow he was able to return a message over this strange long-distance f=
orm of communication.

"If you can hear me," he yelled aloud, "respond pron=
to..this.....this is Joker!  My status is...critical..."

And once again, h=
e fell forward onto the ground into a lifeless state...
